name: Hatha
description: Foundation of all yoga styles focusing on physical postures and breathing

name: Vinyasa
description: Flow-based dynamic practice linking breath with movement

name: Ashtanga
description: Structured eight-limbed path with rigorous sequences

name: Iyengar
description: Precise alignment focus using props and detailed instruction

name: Bikram
description: Hot yoga practice in heated room for detoxification

name: Kundalini
description: Energy awakening practice emphasizing meditation and chanting

name: Yin
description: Deep tissue slow practice holding poses for flexibility

name: Restorative
description: Passive relaxation practice for stress relief and healing

name: Power Yoga
description: Fast-paced athletic style building strength and endurance

name: Yin-Yang
description: Combination of active and passive poses
